alert.note: Alert for Boise Mountains; Upper Treasure Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 5:14PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Elmore County through 545 PM MDT... At 514 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tollgate, or 11 miles north of Mountain Home, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Danskin Peak around 530 PM MDT. Anderson Dam, Prairie, Little Camas Reservoir and Anderson Ranch Reservoir around 540 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for southwestern Idaho.
